name: api_rendering_NavMeshAgent

properties.name: acceleration
properties.description: The maximum acceleration of an agent as it follows a path, given in units / sec^2.

properties.name: agentTypeID
properties.description: The type ID for the agent.

properties.name: angularSpeed
properties.description: Maximum turning speed in (deg/s) while following a path.

properties.name: areaMask
properties.description: Specifies which NavMesh areas are passable. Changing areaMask will make the path stale (see isPathStale).

properties.name: autoBraking
properties.description: Should the agent brake automatically to avoid overshooting the destination point?

properties.name: autoRepath
properties.description: Should the agent attempt to acquire a new path if the existing path becomes invalid?

properties.name: autoTraverseOffMeshLink
properties.description: Should the agent move across OffMeshLinks automatically?

properties.name: avoidancePriority
properties.description: The avoidance priority level.

properties.name: baseOffset
properties.description: The relative vertical displacement of the owning GameObject.

properties.name: currentOffMeshLinkData
properties.description: The current OffMeshLinkData.

properties.name: desiredVelocity
properties.description: The desired velocity of the agent including any potential contribution from avoidance. (Read Only)

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Gets or attempts to set the destination of the agent in world-space units.

properties.name: hasPath
properties.description: Does the agent currently have a path? (Read Only)

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the agent for purposes of passing under obstacles, etc.

properties.name: isOnNavMesh
properties.description: Is the agent currently bound to the navmesh? (Read Only)

properties.name: isOnOffMeshLink
properties.description: Is the agent currently positioned on an OffMeshLink? (Read Only)

properties.name: isPathStale
properties.description: Is the current path stale. (Read Only)

properties.name: isStopped
properties.description: Use this property to set, or get, whether the NavMesh agent stops or continues its movement along the current path.

properties.name: navMeshOwner
properties.description: Returns the owning object of the NavMesh the agent is currently placed on (Read Only).

properties.name: nextOffMeshLinkData
properties.description: The next OffMeshLinkData on the current path.
